selections.name: Iceman
selections.reason: Consistent performer who finished 2nd at this track and distance last start. Draws perfectly in barrier 2 and maps to get a soft run.

selections.name: Geemes
selections.reason: Resuming here but won first-up last preparation at this track. Trialled well and looks a key threat.

selections.name: Starphistocated
selections.reason: Finished 2nd in a Midway here last start. Racing well but has to overcome a wider draw.

selections.name: Tartana
selections.reason: Solid 4th in a Midway last time out. Drops in weight and represents value for exotics.

danger_horse.name: Geemes
danger_horse.reason: Proven fresh performer with course and distance winning form.

selections.name: Highway Strip
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class from Benchmark 78 grade to a Highway Class 3. Despite the top weight, his class edge is substantial.

selections.name: Solitario
selections.reason: Resuming for a top stable with James McDonald booked. Trialled well and looks ready to fire fresh.

selections.name: New Pharoah
selections.reason: Last start winner who draws the inside gate. Will get a lovely run and be competitive.

selections.name: Winning Emotions
selections.reason: Racing consistently and gets in with a light weight. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Solitario
danger_horse.reason: J-Mac booking signals strong intent from the stable first-up.

selections.name: Bev's Nine
selections.reason: Unbeaten in 4 starts and resumed with a strong win at this track in BM78 grade. The one to beat despite the wide gate.

selections.name: Hezdarnhottoo
selections.reason: Talented type resuming. Trialled well and has the ability to challenge if he can overcome the car park draw.

selections.name: Signor Tortoni
selections.reason: Last start winner who maps well from barrier 2. Consistent type.

selections.name: Eagle Express
selections.reason: Another last start winner who draws well. In good form and must be included.

danger_horse.name: Hezdarnhottoo
danger_horse.reason: High ceiling talent who could blow them away if right.

selections.name: Emirate
selections.reason: Resuming. Brings Group 1 form (4th Spring Champion) to a Benchmark race. Class runner of the field.

selections.name: Uzziah
selections.reason: Honest campaigner who finished 2nd in this grade last start. Will be thereabouts.

selections.name: Captain Furai
selections.reason: Finished 3rd last start and is ready to peak third-up. Has to deal with a wide gate.

selections.name: La Roja
selections.reason: Runner-up last start and draws softly. Good each-way hope.

danger_horse.name: Uzziah
danger_horse.reason: Consistent and hard fit, unlike the resuming favourite.

selections.name: Lord Penman
selections.reason: Resuming. Ran in the Golden Eagle last prep. J-Mac rides and trials have been solid. Looks the class runner.

selections.name: Magnatear
selections.reason: Fit and racing well, coming off a 4th in the Magic Millions Cup. Draws the rail.

selections.name: Palmetto
selections.reason: Group performer resuming with a big weight. Class will carry him a long way.

selections.name: Thunderlips
selections.reason: Fitter for recent racing and drops into a suitable race.

danger_horse.name: Magnatear
danger_horse.reason: Race fitness advantage over the top picks.

selections.name: Hidrix
selections.reason: Impressive winner of the G3 Canonbury on debut. Beat several of these rivals and can repeat.

selections.name: Incognito
selections.reason: Finished 2nd to Hidrix last start but meets him better at the weights. Can turn the tables.

selections.name: Shiki
selections.reason: Resuming Group 3 winner. Has the class on the board.

selections.name: Confederation
selections.reason: Also comes out of the Canonbury (2nd). Draws well and is in the mix.

danger_horse.name: Incognito
danger_horse.reason: Weight swing and experience makes him a major threat.

selections.name: Travolta
selections.reason: One of the few runners with recent racing fitness. 4th last start and ready to peak.

selections.name: Sibaaq
selections.reason: Fit and in form, coming off a 2nd. Will roll forward and be hard to catch.

selections.name: Just Fine
selections.reason: Group 1 winner resuming. Class of the field but might need the run over this trip.

selections.name: Touristic
selections.reason: Another fit runner coming off a 2nd. Must be respected in a field of resumers.

danger_horse.name: Sibaaq
danger_horse.reason: Fitness edge is massive in this field.

selections.name: Autumn Boy
selections.reason: Caulfield Guineas winner resuming. The clear class runner and trials have been good.

selections.name: Napoleonic
selections.reason: Fit from a 2nd in the Esk Prince. Will keep the favourite honest.

selections.name: Ninja
selections.reason: Bring strong Queensland form (2nd Magic Millions Guineas). Hard fit.

selections.name: Attica
selections.reason: Spring Champion winner resuming. Might find this a touch short but has class.

danger_horse.name: Napoleonic
danger_horse.reason: Race fitness is a big advantage.

selections.name: Lazzura
selections.reason: Group 1 placed mare resuming. Superior class to this field.

selections.name: Cinsault
selections.reason: Chasing a hat-trick of wins. Flying at the moment and draws perfectly.

selections.name: Heat Missile
selections.reason: Last start winner who is on the up.

selections.name: Cilacap
selections.reason: Resuming. Has ability and draws well.

danger_horse.name: Cinsault
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is hard to knock.

selections.name: Kreon
selections.reason: Last start winner who looks to have plenty of upside. Light weight.

selections.name: Hawker Hall
selections.reason: Also a last start winner. J-Mac rides which is a huge plus.

selections.name: Kerguelen
selections.reason: Resuming. Has shown plenty of ability in previous preps.

selections.name: Lulumon
selections.reason: Consistent and draws well. Good place chance.
